articles.author: Coral Smith
articles.title: Chargers CB J.C. Jackson not expected to play Week 1 vs. Raiders after recent ankle surgery - NFL.com
articles.description: J.C. Jackson's status for the Chargers' Week 1 matchup versus the Las Vegas Raiders was already dubious after having surgery on his ankle only a couple weeks ago. And it looks like the tight turnaround is not going to work out for the cornerback.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sources: Sacramento Republic files complaint over alleged Orlando City spy - ESPN
articles.description: Sacramento Republic has filed a complaint with USSF, alleging that an Orlando staffer was spying on its training session, sources have told ESPN.

articles.author: Robert McCoppin, Gregory Pratt
articles.title: Bears may build domed stadium in Arlington Heights - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: For the first time, the Chicago Bears confirmed Tuesday that the stadium the team is considering building in Arlington Heights would be domed — but the team also called for taxpayer funding of a portion of the project.
